meanings.sent1: She made a prepaying arrangement for her monthly bills.
meanings.sent2: The prepaying customer received a discount for their early payment.
meanings.sent3: The prepaying party planner ensured everything was settled ahead of time.
meanings.sent4: His prepaying nature always kept him ahead of the game.
meanings.sent5: The prepaying strategy proved to be a smart move in the long run.

meanings.definition: To pay for something before it is due.
meanings.sent1: He decided to prepaying his loan to avoid extra interest.
meanings.sent2: She prepaying her rent to secure the apartment for the next month.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel prepaying for winter by storing nuts in advance.
meanings.sent4: Prepaying for success means putting in the effort early on.
meanings.sent5: The student prepaying for the exam felt more confident in their preparation.
